thread.title: Very good cost performance hotel
thread.title_full: Very good cost performance hotel - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ozaki303
title: Very good cost performance hotel
text: I stayed at a Double Extra Room of this hotel for 13 nights. It is conveniently close to Hammersmith underground station. The room is wide and clean, although the bathroom seems a bit narrow. The staffs are very kind. Very good hospitality. I think I would stay at this hotel again when visiting London next time.
